metadata.name: DEATH-JOY SOLDIER
metadata.description:
DESCRIPTION:

Condemned to endlessly re-experience its darkest moments, this creature emerged from the residual energy of the TV owner's preferred genres of entertainment - a hybrid of historical war flicks and action; forced into existence against its own will.

BIO:

Chroma Code is a Canadian artist that specializes in analog glitching, photography & filmmaking.

DETAILS:

Video Size: 2160 x 2700px
TV Model & Year: Sylvania, 2002
